articles.description: Savings account interest rates have recently been revised by a few banks. Here's a look at the savings account interest rates offered by HDFC Bank, State Bank of India (SBI), ICICI Bank and Punjab National Bank (PNB).
articles.content: Savings account balances earn interest, which varies from bank to bank and is based on the amount one has deposited in the account. When compared to fixed deposit interest rates (depending on the ten… [+2082 chars]
